title: So since Kayle becomes unmasked in game by default.  Can unmasked become Armored Kayle?

replies.body:
No it will be prestige edition 

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-LJNU0zovfXw/Wi70Q6Qe9QI/AAAAAAAA1Us/UAdB0bmeh4Y3WmOEoxV-RJedLJutyZvRwCLcBGAs/s1600/16f2935c13a384d4.png
I think they're going to overhaul the skin completely from scratch. Its a thing in the past to actually have an "unmasked kayle" Aether wing completely dismissed the purpose of that skin long ago.
Personally I actually preferred Unmasked, I honestly love Kayle's current live armor and have for year, I only disliked her helmet so Unmasked was the perfect alternative for me.

inb4 unmasked kayle just becomes kayle wearing entirely casual clothing 

ᵗᵇʰ ᶦ ʷᵒᵘˡᵈⁿᵗ ᵉᵛᵉⁿ ᵇᵉ ᵐᵃᵈ
More likely Unmasked will get something extra... hope so.

> [{quoted}](name=LusterCrown,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ern49rsa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-02-18T23:04:43.590+0000)
>
> More likely Unmasked will get something extra... hope so.

True unmasking
Defleshed...  Lich Kayle.
Banshee Queen Kayle

[(https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kKbP0zSWsnw/XGwmD3nUJcI/AAAAAAABO9s/Xe5mRp5iOnc7xfjZT6I-wXqNMvIEjHWCgCLcBGAs/s1920/Wallpaper_Transcended_Kayle.jpg)]

Nope. Sorry. Only shoulder pads.
The reworked Kayle has her helmet on, so this thread kinda makes no sense.
She takes it off as she levels up.
Really? I can't find the source of this.

> [{quoted}](name=20022012,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ern49rsa,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2019-02-19T13:53:52.539+0000)
>
> Really? I can't find the source of this.

look at the video lmao

There is nothing that would imply the unmasking is triggered by levelling. For all we know it could be toggleable. I was thinking that a Rioter said levelling her would remove her mask, since we knew that levelling her abilities up would empower them but because nothing of that kind was said, it's just as wrong to assume that she will be unmasked by levelling as it is to presume the opposite.

Nah. I have unmasked and I hope they do it like with Chrimson Akali: make a completely new skin out of it. 
She is armoured enough for an immortal being. I just got this skin to show her face and not to get more boring clumsy armour which doesn’t fit.

[Unmasked Kayle became Transcendent Kayle ](https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-champion-update-kayle-morgana/en_GB/5522676cc32e3aedf39ebf3c0c9d82890fd77866/assets/img/content/kayleMorgana/wallpaper/splash/Transcended-Kayle_FINAL.jpg)
full metal kayle skin incoming where she gets more armor as she levels up, basically like how you need spirit guardian udyr if you want the champion you want how you want it to look
Battleborn already exists for an armored version. Pretty sure Unmasked became something new.

I am excited to see where they go with her skins as she had a lot of the same issues Akali had with older skins... that being they were just recolors. I would venture to say they are gonna make a lot of the skins more fleshed out and prolly add them to different already existing skin universes. Just gotta wait it out and see :)
Actually, that would be nice LOL
And then swap that out for the original, so then it shows that Kayle has always been in full armour.
Here's hoping.
and judgement will the shoulders BULGE?
Better make her classic skin properly armored and then make a naked Kayle skin to please horny teens.
